name: tiny-tiny-rss
description: Tiny Tiny RSS (tt-rss) is a self-hosted web-based RSS/Atom feed reader. It supports filters, plugins, multiple users, and mobile-friendly themes, giving full control over news aggregation.
features: Feed aggregation: Subscribe to unlimited RSS and Atom feeds from news sites, blogs, and podcasts.
Multi-user: Support multiple users with individual subscriptions, preferences, and reading history.
Filters: Create powerful filters to automatically tag, mark, or hide articles based on content or source.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with plugins for features like sharing, archiving, or custom integrations.
Mobile themes: Access feeds from mobile devices with responsive themes optimized for touch interfaces.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate articles and feeds efficiently using comprehensive keyboard shortcuts.
Article sharing: Share interesting articles via email, social media, or custom sharing services.
OPML support: Import and export feed subscriptions using standard OPML format for portability.
Feed categories: Organize feeds into categories and folders for better management of large subscription lists.
Search: Find articles across all feeds using full-text search with date and feed filters.
API access: Integrate with mobile apps and third-party clients using the compatible API.
Content filtering: Block unwanted content with regex-based filters and scoring systems.
